text:
e="preserve">Hatem Ali () (2 June 1962 – 29 December 2020) was a Syrian television and movie director and actor. His career began in 1988. He was born in Fiq, Syria. He was known for his television roles in "Al-Taghreba al-Falastenya", "Salah Al-deen", and "Omar TV series".
Ali died on 29 December 2020 in Cairo from a heart attack at the age of 58.
